Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout

[Groovy] Class AbstractTransformer

    • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout.AbstractTransformer

    • This abstract class is used as base for all classes that wrap XSLT stylesheets. It wraps common methods for transformation and validaion and contains fields needed for this tasks like a link to a schema or the name of the required stylesheet.

      Authors:
      cmahnke

          Transforms the given document using the given stylesheet with parameters.

          the result Document

          xslt - the Source of the stylesheet
          params - parameters of the stylesheet

        • protected static Document transform(URL input, URL stylesheet, Map params)

          Transforms the given document using the given stylesheet with parameters. This is just a wrapper for transform which opens an InputStream to create a Source from it an passes this as parameter

          Returns:
          Document the result Document
          Parameters:
          input - the URL for the input document
          stylesheet - the URL to the stylesheet
          params - parameters of the stylesheet
          See Also:
          transform(javax.xml.transform.Source,javax.xml.transform.Source,java.util.Map)

        • protected static Document transform(URL input, URL stylesheet)

          Transforms the given document using the given stylesheet without parameters. This is just a wrapper for transform which passes a empty Map as parameter

          Returns:
          the result Document
          Parameters:
          input - the URL for the input document
          stylesheet - the URL to the stylesheet
          See Also:
          transform(java.net.URL,java.net.URL,java.util.Map)

        • void transform()

          Abstract method that needs to be implemented by extending classes that do the actual transformation. These are usually just wrappers around the preotected transform methods.

          See Also:
          transform(java.net.URL,java.net.URL)
          transform(java.net.URL,java.net.URL,java.util.Map)
          transform(java.net.URL,javax.xml.transform.Source,java.util.Map)

        • protected static Boolean validateParams(Map params)

          Stub of a validation method, overide it fi your stylesheet needs a validation of params

          Returns:
          Boolean the result of the validation
